summary: The Veterans Administration established the Family Caregiver Program in 2011 to help families provide care to seriously injured veterans. It developed an IT system to help it run this program but the system has many problems. We reported on these problems in 2014 . For example, the system does not provide VA with data that would enable the agency to monitor how the Family Caregiver...
title: VA Health IT: Use of Acquisition Best Practices Can Improve Efforts to Implement a System to Support the Family Caregiver Program
